meanings.definition: A member of a youth gang, especially in a Hispanic community.
meanings.sent1: The cholos in the neighborhood were known for their tight-knit group.
meanings.sent2: The police were concerned about the presence of cholos in the area.
meanings.sent3: The cholos decided to have a dance-off to settle their differences.
meanings.sent4: The cholos' loyalty to each other was as strong as steel.
meanings.sent5: The image of the cholos hanging out on the street corner was hard to forget.

meanings.definition: A style of dress associated with urban youth culture, typically characterized by baggy clothing and baseball caps.
meanings.sent1: She adopted the cholo style by wearing oversized jeans and a cap.
meanings.sent2: The fashion store displayed the latest cholo trends in their window.
meanings.sent3: He surprised his friends by showing up in full cholo attire to the party.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence soared when she embraced the cholo look.
meanings.sent5: The cholo outfit made him feel like a different person altogether.

meanings.definition: A type of graffiti art often associated with gang culture.
meanings.sent1: The alleyway was covered in colorful cholo graffiti.
meanings.sent2: The city council aimed to reduce the amount of cholo art in public spaces.
meanings.sent3: The cholo graffiti on the wall seemed to come to life at night.
meanings.sent4: The cholo artwork told stories of the streets in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The cholo graffiti added a unique flair to the urban landscape.
